categoryBlurb: Deployed service members and their loved ones are often in unique situations. The time apart can be tough all around, and a little support can go a long way. These gift ideas  are some of our favorite products and services we've seen gifted to these military families, and often their favorite part is the card with messages of love and support.

productList.productDescription:
Not meant for the Sunday driver, the Motor Oil is designed for the rocker in all of us. The double-humbucker configuration is built for overdrive. Whether you rock like the British Invasion or the Sunset Strip, the Motor Oil is as gentle as a chainsaw.


THE SPECS


Model: Motor Oil!
Body: Recycled metal hollow body w/ removable back panel. Basswood frame for increased amplification and structural integrity
Neck Wood: Maple
Neck type: Bohemian Through-Body
Fretboard: Rosewood
Headstock: Red
Finish: Golden Glaze
Frets: 21
Nut Width: 1 3/4"
Width at 12th Fret: 2 1/8"
Width at 21st Fret: 2 3/8"
Neck Thickness: 7/8"
Scale Length: 25 1/2"
Hardware: Chrome
Tuners: 3R 3L screw in w/ removable keys
Bridge/Tailpiece: Tune-o-Matic
Pickups: Humbucker, Humbucker
Electronics: Volume, Tone
Switch: 3-way toggle
Self-standing: This model has a built in stand made from recycled rubber.
Inspired by South Africa. Designed in Atlanta. Produced in China.


Learn more here: https://www.bohemianguitars.com/bohemian-motor-oil-electric-guitar


Video: https://youtu.be/3cSLKoAfv6U
productList.productMetaDescription: Bohemian Guitar is designed for the rocker in all of us, built for over drive, and as gentle as a chainsaw. The perfect gift.

productList.productName: Garmin Forerunner 220 GPS Heart Rate Monitor
productList.productDescription:
Garmin is a trusted name in standard GPS devices, and they do not disappoint when it comes to this wearable GPS watch. The easy to read color display tracks distance and pace without any shoe chips. Whether it's a service member doing PT or a family member training at home, the included chest strap with sensor will give an accurate heart rate reading during the whole workout.


Additional product details can been seen here: details
productList.productMetaDescription: A great gift for any fitness enthusiast, this watch does the work of several wearable devices. With GPS, distance, pace, and heart rate, it's worth every penny.

productList.productName: Suunto Core Multifunction Watch - All Black
productList.productDescription:
A favorite among service members, this watch has an array of functions that make it an ideal daily accessory. It has an altimeter, barometer, and compass, and it's water resistant up to 100 feet. The elastomer band makes this watch highly comfortable and durable while retaining a professional look. Additionally, the Suunto Core watch can track multiple time zones, so those calls to home won't come at 3:00 in the morning (hopefully ;) ).


Additional product details can been seen here: details
productList.productMetaDescription: Altimeter, barometer, compass, timer, time zone tracker, and more! This watch comes fully loaded with excellent features sure to impress any outdoorsman—or woman!

productList.productDescription:
When we ask our military what they need in the field, "JERKY!" always shows up somewhere on their lists. The folks over at Mancrates have put together this delicious box filled with 12 bags of beef jerky in various flavors. It ships in an actual wooden crate and comes with a laser etched crow bar to open it with. This gift is sure to lift spirits and provide a nice break from MREs.


This crate includes the following:


2 packs of Krave: Chili Lime, 2 packs of Krave: Garlic Chili Pepper, 2 packs of Country Archer, 2 packs of Real Steak, 2 packs of Jeff's Famous Jerky, 2 packs of Field Trip


Additional product details can been seen here: details
productList.productMetaDescription: Chili Lime, Garlic, and Real Steak, this crate is filled with jerky sure to satisfy! Great for soldiers in the field, seamen and marines afloat, and everything in between!

productList.productDescription:
Down range or at home, card games can be a fun way to pass the time (and stir up a little healthy competition!). Money doesn't have to be involved in order to have a good time—use the chips to barter snacks and treats or trade off chores! This set ships in a geniune, NATO spec ammo case that is air-tight, waterproof, and virtually indestructable.


This can includes the following:


2 decks of custom playing cards, 300 casino-weight, 11.5 gram composite chips, and an exclusive poker chip insert


Additional product details can been seen here: details
productList.productMetaDescription: Finding effective ways to pass the time apart can be trying. This package has the cards (2 decks) and chips you need to play virtually any standard card game.

productList.productDescription: Apple iTunes gift cards are particularly good gifts for military families. They can be redeemed for movies, music, and books that can help them pass the time apart, and apps that can help to keep them connected. There are often long road trips involved in visiting family for the holidays or moving to their next duty station, and an iDevice freshly loaded with new media can make the trip more manageable for everyone involved.
productList.productMetaDescription: An iTunes gift card is the ultimate gift in entertainment. It can be used in the iTunes Store, App Store, iBooks Store, and Mac App Store. Give them the media they want!

productList.productDescription:
Send a box overseas to share with the unit, have a box handy to celebrate a homecoming—whatever the occasion, Gurkha Warlords offer premium full-bodied taste. To top off the experience, they come packed inside a high-end treasure-chest style box.


Additional product details can been seen here: details
productList.productMetaDescription: Eloquent full-bodied cigars from Nicaragua appropriate for any occasion!

productList.productName: Xbox One with Kinect Assassin’s Creed Unity Bundle
productList.productDescription:
Aside from this high-end gaming system being a great way to fill some hours of down-time, one of the best features of the Xbox One is the new and improved Kinect. The camera can campture the entire living room, which makes it exceptional for Skype video chats. Military families typically live in different states, and sometimes countries, than their relatives. With the Xbox One and Kinect, grandparents, aunts, uncles, cousins, even deployed parents and best friends from the last duty station can be virtually present on the big screen tv where everyone can chat with them.


This gift would also be greatly appreciated down range. While they may not be able to play the games online, they will be the envy of all their friends.


Additional product details can been seen here: details
productList.productMetaDescription: The Xbox One with Kinect system bundled with Assassins Creed IV and Assassins Creed Unity is more than just a gaming system. Stay connected with loved ones and stream the latest movies and music!

productList.productDescription: There is a joke among military families about a thing called "deployment curse." It is to this that they attribute the car breaking down, the kids getting sick, the washing machine overflowing, and the roof starting to leak all within the first week of a spouse being called away. While it may not always be so extreme, it is always a hectic and trying time when adjusting to the absence and being a temporary single parent. A clean home can do wonders for their state of mind and stress levels. The experts at Molly Maid can make the home feel just a bit more like normal.
productList.productMetaDescription: Give the gift of a clean home! Molly Maid maid service is available in most cities nationwide.

productList.productDescription:
Parents need breaks, and kids need sitters. Making these two things happen can sometimes be a pretty big ordeal for military families. Most of them live hundreds—if not thousands—of miles away from extended family and close friends. Care.com is an excellent resource, and even offers background checks on potential caregivers so parents can have peace of mind. 


This gift will be in the form of a Visa cash card that the recipient can use toward Care.com membership fees and/or payment for sitters through the site. To purchase a card of greater or lesser value, please message the Gift Concerige (giftconcierge@giftstarter.com).
productList.productMetaDescription: Finding childcare can be a burden. Give the gift of dependable, affordable care for their littlest loved ones.

productList.productDescription:
Deployments, field training, tours afloat, temporary duty, 14 hour work days, frequent moves, new jobs—SPA DAY. The stress and worry, exhaustion and unanswered questions can all be set aside, if even just for a few hours. Spafinder gift cards are accepted at over 22,000 locations nation wide, and can be redeemed for massages, facials, yoga, mani/pedicures and more.


To purchase a card of greater or lesser value, please message the Gift Concerige (giftconcierge@giftstarter.com).
productList.productMetaDescription: Pamper a military spouse today with a spa finder gift card! Redeemable for a variety of spa and fitness packages nation wide.

productList.productDescription: When the family is together, they'll want to preserve all those special memories; if they're apart, they'll want to capture all the precious moments to share when they can. This Panasonic LUMIX digital camera shoots full 1080p HD video at 60 frames per second to record first steps, birthday wishes, and goodbye kisses. The 30x optical zoom is nearly unheard of in point and shoot cameras. This means they can rest assured that their pictures will be crisp and clear no matter how far away they're taken. And just in case the memory card gets left behind, this camera does have 86MB of built in memory to hold a few images in a pinch!
productList.productMetaDescription: A great gift for any family, this digital camera boasts 12.1 megapixels, 30x optical zoom, full HD 1080p video, and Wi-Fi connectivity.

productList.productDescription:
When it's time to settle in for a relaxing night at home, this kit has everything a family needs to enjoy a movie or two. Start the night off with dinner—the Papa John's gift card ($40 value) can be redeemed for pizzas, soda, breadsticks, cookies, and more, and Papa John's delivers so no one has to leave the house! The cozy queen size blanket is large enough to cuddle under with a bowl of popcorn for the kids and some chocolates for the parents. All the movies available for this kit are combo packs of Bluray, DVD, and digital copy so no matter how they prefer to watch, they're sure to be able to.


You will be able to chose two (2) of the foloowing movies to be included in this kit:


Big Hero 6


The Book of Life


Divergent


The Guardians of the Galaxy


The Lorax


Maleficent


Pitch Perfect


 


If you would like to include different movies, please contact the Gift Concierge (giftconcierge@giftstarter.com)
productList.productMetaDescription: A family movie night in a box! Two Bluray/DVD/Digital Copy combo films with dinner and snacks all wrapped up in a micro plush throw.

productList.productName: Fat Cork &quot;All About the Grape&quot; Champagne Set
productList.productDescription:
This set of fine champagne is perfect for celebrating milestones. A great way to use these three bottles is around deployment times. Pop open the first bottle during a special farewell dinner. The second bottle can be enjoyed by the spouse to celebrate the deployment's mid-way point. Leave the third bottle in a special place as a reminder of the good times to come, and open it once the family is reunited. If they're the sentimental type, preserving the corks in a special box or jar can be a meaningful keepsake and symbol of the strength and love it takes to make it through deployments.


Details about the Champagne: 


Alexandre Lenique Cuvée Excellence Pur Noir


This cuvée is 100% Pinot Noir, but completely star bright in color. It holds a bead of extremely fine and abundant bubbles, while delivering aromas of raspberry, red apple, a spicy character, and apple skin. It has an incredible finish that is lengthy, yet very clean. As it settles in the glass it smooths out and finishes more full-bodied. This is an excellent cuvée with a long future ahead.


Gimonnet-Oger Blanc de Blancs Premier Cru


This 100% Chardonnay cuvée is based on the excellent 2005 vintage-- meaning this wine has been aged for 7 years! The palate is rich and expressive with the gorgeous chardonnay showing off for your senses.


Didier-Ducos Fils Absolu Meunier


This 100% Pinot Meunier comes from only the oldest Ducos family vines. The palate is bold, and almost thick with fresh cream and hints of spice. This is a pure example of the outstanding character inherit in the normally obscure Pinot Meunier grape.
productList.productMetaDescription: Three bottles of fine champagne to celebrate any occasion: Pinot Noir cuvée, Chardonnay cuvée, and Pinot Meunier. All three grapes, grown by the masters of each.
